1.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
1.description: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer HAL 9000.

2.name: Bullitt
2.description: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

3.name: Barbarella
3.description: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

4.name: Rachel, Rachel
4.description: Rachel is a 35 year old school teacher who has no man in her life and lives with her mother. When a man from the big city returns and asks her out, she begins to have to make decisions about her life and where she wants it to go.

5.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
5.description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

6.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
6.description: A debonair, adventuresome bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect multi-million dollar heist, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator who will do anything to get her man.

7.name: Rosemary's Baby
7.description: A young couple moves in to an apartment only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins to control her life.

8.name: The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter
8.description: When deaf mute Singer moves to a small city to be near his only friend confined in a hospital, he grows attached to his landlady's sensitive 16-year-old daughter.

9.name: Romeo and Juliet
9.description: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

10.name: Where Eagles Dare
10.description: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding an American General prisoner... but that's not all that's really going on.

11.name: Planet of the Apes
11.description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

12.name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
12.description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

13.name: Night of the Living Dead
13.description: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

14.name: Hang 'Em High
14.description: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

15.name: Diabolik
15.description: International man of mystery Diabolik and his sensuous lover Eva Kant pull off heist after heist, all while European cops led by Inspector Ginko and envious mobsters led by Ralph Valmont are closing in on them.

16.name: The Lion in Winter
16.description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

17.name: Oliver!
17.description: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

18.name: The Odd Couple
18.description: Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

19.name: Funny Girl
19.description: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

20.name: The Party
20.description: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

21.name: Skidoo
21.description: Infamous psychedelic all-star comedy about ex-gangster Tony Banks, who's called out of retirement by mob kingpin God to carry out a hit on fellow mobster "Blue Chips" Packard. When Banks ...                See full summary »

22.name: Yours, Mine and Ours
22.description: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

23.name: Il grande silenzio
23.description: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, as a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

24.name: Candy
24.description: Candy, an innocent high-schooler, encounters numerous colorful characters and humorous sexual situations while attempting to find meaning in life.

25.name: The Swimmer
25.description: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

26.name: Greetings
26.description: An offbeat, episodic film about three friends, Paul, a shy love-seeker, Lloyd, a vibrant conspiracy nut, and Jon, an aspiring filmmaker and peeping tom. The film satirizes free-love, the ...                See full summary »

27.name: Wild in the Streets
27.description: A young man gains significant political influence as the leader of a counterculture rock band with his rallying cry of voting rights for teenagers.

28.name: The Devil's Brigade
28.description: An American colonel who has never been in combat is assigned to create a special forces unit from Canadian Army troops and a ragtag group of U.S. Army misfits.

29.name: Yellow Submarine
29.description: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his Yellow Submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music hating Blue Meanies.

30.name: If....
30.description: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.

31.name: The Love Bug
31.description: A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.

32.name: Ice Station Zebra
32.description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

33.name: Coogan's Bluff
33.description: An Arizona deputy sheriff is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

34.name: Charly
34.description: An intellectually disabled man undergoes an experiment that gives him the intelligence of a genius.

35.name: Psych-Out
35.description: A deaf runaway arrives in San Francisco's Haight-Ashbury hippie district looking for her missing brother.

36.name: Krakatoa: East of Java
36.description: In 1883, ship captain Hanson plans a shipwreck salvage mission in The Dutch East Indies to retrieve a cargo of pearls but an unexpected volcano eruption and a state-ordered transport of convicts upset his plans.

37.name: Duffy
37.description: Duffy is a cunning aristocrat of criminals who is hired by Stefane, a young playboy, to hijack a boat carrying several million dollars of his father's fortune. The plot succeeds, with a ...                See full summary »

38.name: I quattro dell'Ave Maria
38.description: A recently-escaped bandit forms an unlikely alliance with two bounty hunters and an acrobat to get revenge against the people who framed him.

39.name: The Green Berets
39.description: Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

40.name: Vargtimmen
40.description: While vacationing on a remote Scandanavian island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

41.name: Hellfighters
41.description: The story of macho oil well firefighters and their wives.

42.name: Vixen!
42.description: Vixen lives in a Canadian mountain resort with her naive pilot husband. While he's away flying in tourists, she gets it on with practically everybody including a husband and his wife, and ...                See full summary »

43.name: I Love You, Alice B. Toklas!
43.description: A thirty-something square falls in love with a hippie and decides to "drop out" himself.

44.name: The Girl on a Motorcycle
44.description: A married woman leaves her husband and zooms off on her motorcycle to see her lover.

45.name: Head
45.description: The Monkees are tossed about in a psychedelic, surrealist, plotless, circular bit of fun fluff.

46.name: Histoires extraordinaires
46.description: Anthology film from three European directors based on stories by Edgar Allan Poe: a cruel princess haunted by a ghostly horse, a sadistic young man haunted by his double, and an alcoholic actor haunted by the Devil.

47.name: The Devil Rides Out
47.description: Devil worshipers plan to convert two new victims.

48.name: Isadora
48.description: A biography of the dancer Isadora Duncan, the 1920s dancer who forever changed people's ideas of ballet. Her nude, semi-nude, and pro-Soviet dance projects as well as her attitudes on free ...                See full summary »

49.name: Skammen
49.description: In the midst of a civil war, former violinists Jan and Eva Rosenberg, who have a tempestuous marriage, run a farm on a rural island. In spite of their best efforts to escape their homeland, the war impinges on every aspect of their lives.

50.name: Witchfinder General
50.description: A young soldier seeks to put an end to the evils caused by a vicious witch hunter.
